archdesc.runner: Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Digital Libraries and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Small unidentified account notebook listing personal expenditures, including tavern bills and money paid "to negroes for carrying trunks."

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Account Book must be obtained from the Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Account Book, Ms90-064, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The owner of this notebook from an unidentified place is unknown.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This small 1893 notebook lists someone's personal expenditures, including costs of candles, tavern bills, and money paid "to negroes for carrying trunks."
